pr_title: don't let users include certain words during user rename

timeline.message: don't let users include certain words during user rename

timeline.bodyText:
Whatever this pattern is (see next item), should be a static, ideally; regexes are relatively expensive.
I feel this regex is more complicated than need be -- you're using lookaheads I think, whose syntax I always have to look up. They have their place, but can't you just have the pattern be Pattern.compile("dockstore|admin|curator|system|manager")? And then change line 273 to if (matcher.find()) { ? I may be missing a more complex case though.
I think you should leave a backdoor for admins and curators. We may want to use some of these for ourselves.
timeline.author: coverbeck

replies.bodyText: After some discussion, not addressing third point. Okay for now.
replies.author: NatalieEO

timeline.author: coverbeck

timeline.bodyText: Ideally you would have some valid usernames as well, to make sure your code just doesn't always reject everything. Not that it does, and it's pretty straightforward. Just for future reference.
timeline.author: coverbeck
